display_html: type Box f a = (Unlift Exp (f (Exp a)), Plain (f (Exp a)) ~ f a)
name: Box

display_html: type Box2 f g a = (Box f (g a), Box g a, Lift Exp (f (g (Exp a))), Plain (f (g (Exp a))) ~ f (g a))
name: Box2

class Additive f => Additive f where

  • (^-^) :: forall a. (Num a, Box f a) => Exp (f a) -> Exp (f a) -> Exp (f a)
  • lerp :: forall a. (Num a, Box f a) => Exp a -> Exp (f a) -> Exp (f a) -> Exp (f a)
name: Additive lerp ^-^ ^+^ zero

display_html: (!*!) :: (Functor m, Foldable t, Additive t, Additive n, Num a, Box2 m t a, Box2 t n a, Box2 m n a) => Exp (m (t a)) -> Exp (t (n a)) -> Exp (m (n a))
(!+!) :: (Additive m, Additive n, Num a, Box2 m n a) => Exp (m (n a)) -> Exp (m (n a)) -> Exp (m (n a))
(!-!) :: (Additive m, Additive n, Num a, Box2 m n a) => Exp (m (n a)) -> Exp (m (n a)) -> Exp (m (n a))
(!*) :: (Functor m, Foldable r, Additive r, Num a, Box2 m r a, Box m a) => Exp (m (r a)) -> Exp (r a) -> Exp (m a)
(*!) :: (Foldable t, Additive f, Additive t, Num a, Box t a, Box f a, Box2 t f a) => Exp (t a) -> Exp (t (f a)) -> Exp (f a)
